original: Bengtsson, Erik Gustaf, chefredaktör, Karlshamn, f. 9/11/13 i Karls-hiaimn av dir. Foil’ke B. o. Rut Svenson. G. 38 m. Hilda Lütken. Barn: Rikke f. 39. — Stud:ex. 32, degré supé rieur Gours de Civilisa|tion Fran-gaise v. Sorbonne i Paris 38, stud. v. Clark’s College i London, London School of Economics o. École Libre des Sciences Politiques i Paris. Res. t. Danm., Tyskl., Holl., Belg. o. Frankr. 30, Tyskl. 33 o. 36, Engl. 36 o. 37, Frankr. 37 o. 38, Tyskl. o. Frankr. 39, Canada, USA o. Mexico 47. Medarb. i Karlishamns Allehanda 32-36, bitr. Londonkorresp. i Sitock-holms-Tidn.-Aftonbladet 36-37, medarb. å TT utrikesbyrå 39-41, chefred. f. o. ansv. utg. av Karlshamns Allehanda sed. 41. Led. av stadsfullm. i Karlshamn sed. 43, led. av lönendn där sed. 43 o. av kulturvårdsndn där 46. Hobbies: segling, orientering.
translated: Bengtsson, Erik Gustaf, editor-in-chief, Karlshamn, b. 9/11/13 in Karlshamn, the son of director Folke B. and Rut Svenson. Married in 1938 to Hilda Lütken and has one child, Rikke, born in 1939. He completed his high school education in 1932, a higher degree in French civilization at Sorbonne in Paris in 1938, and studied at Clark's College in London, London School of Economics, and École Libre des Sciences Politiques in Paris. He has resided in Denmark, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium, and France in 1930, in Germany in 1933 and 1936, in England in 1936 and 1937, in France in 1937 and 1938, in Germany and France in 1939, as well as in Canada, the USA and Mexico in 1947. He worked for Karlishamns Allehanda from 1932-1936, as an assistant London correspondent for Stockholm's-Tidn.-Aftonbladet from 1936-1937, and as a contributor to TT foreign news agency from 1939-1941. Since 1941, he has been the editor-in-chief and responsible publisher of Karlshamns Allehanda. He has been a member of the city council in Karlshamn since 1943, a member of the salary committee there since 1943, and a member of the cultural preservation committee since 1946. His hobbies include sailing and orienteering.
